create_cloud_project.title: Nest: Create and configure Cloud Project
create_cloud_project.description:
The Nest integration allows you to integrate your Nest Thermostats, Cameras, and Doorbells using the Smart Device Management API. The SDM API **requires a US $5** one time setup fee. See documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

1. Go to the [Google Cloud Console]({cloud_console_url}).
1. If this is your first project, click **Create Project** then **New Project**.
1. Give your Cloud Project a Name and then click **Create**.
1. Save the Cloud Project ID e.g. *example-project-12345* as you will need it later
1. Go to API Library for [Smart Device Management API]({sdm_api_url}) and click **Enable**.
1. Go to API Library for [Cloud Pub/Sub API]({pubsub_api_url}) and click **Enable**.

Proceed when your cloud project is set up.

cloud_project.title: Nest: Enter Cloud Project ID
cloud_project.description: Enter the Cloud Project ID below e.g. *example-project-12345*. See the [Google Cloud Console]({cloud_console_url}) or the documentation for [more info]({more_info_url}).

device_project.title: Nest: Create a Device Access Project
device_project.description:
Create a Nest Device Access project which **requires a US$5 fee** to set up.
1. Go to the [Device Access Console]({device_access_console_url}), and through the payment flow.
1. Click on **Create project**
1. Give your Device Access project a name and click **Next**.
1. Enter your OAuth Client ID
1. Enable events by clicking **Enable** and **Create project**.

Enter your Device Access Project ID below ([more info]({more_info_url})).

auth.title: Nest: Link Google Account
auth.description:
To link your Google account, [authorize your account]({url}).

After authorization, copy-paste the provided Auth Token code below ([more info]({more_info_url})).

pubsub.title: Configure Google Cloud
pubsub.description: Visit the [Cloud Console]({url}) to find your Google Cloud Project ID.

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Nest integration needs to re-authenticate your account

link.title: Link Nest Account
link.description:
To link your Nest account, [authorize your account]({url}).

After authorization, copy-paste the provided PIN code below.

error.bad_project_id: Please enter a valid Cloud Project ID (check Cloud Console)
error.wrong_project_id: Please enter a valid Cloud Project ID (was same as Device Access Project ID)
